data.title: Hoff x Regent's University London
data.text:
Gracey Ama Taah II Owusu-Agyemang, a Ghanaian/Namibian designer, co-founded Dijàgo Studios, showcasing Afro-Futurism through collaborations with local artisans. In 2022, her collection featured at the Victoria and Albert Museum, and in 2023, she designed a bespoke gown for actress Sarah Niles worn at the British Vogue and Tiffany & Co Celebrate Fashion & Film party. Her work reflects a commitment to cultural narratives and craftsmanship.

Khudija Zaib Lughmani co-founded Dijàgo Studios, an Afro-Asian Luxury Brand, blending cultures and traditional textiles. Her work, showcased at the Victoria and Albert Museum, focuses on preserving craftsmanship and South-Asian heritage. In 2023, she collaborated on a bespoke gown for actress Sarah Niles at the British Vogue and Tiffany & Co party.

Louise Roe, TV host and fashion journalist, founded Sharland England. As fashion correspondent for ITV's This Morning, she's known for red carpet reporting at major even as the Oscars, Golden Globes and the Emmys on NBC's Access Hollywood. Her career includes hosting shows in LA and being Vogue's former News Editor. Renowned for her multifaceted style, Roe is a prominent figure in both fashion and interior design.

Remy is a fashion and beauty journalist with a decade of experience in editorial writing, styling and hosting and events. Currently fashion editor for online publication Who What Wear, since moving to London in 2014, she has worked for internationally renowned titles such as Elle, Grazia, and British Vogue, and styled celebrity, ecommerce, and editorial covers and stories.

Paco Valiente, Chief Digital & Marketing Officer at HOFF, with over 25 years of experience in industry giants like Inditex and MediaMarktSaturn, brings strategic leadership to craft innovative digital and marketing strategies. His commitment to excellence aligns seamlessly with the spirit of creativity and innovation in the art world.

With 16 years of experience, including 8 years at esteemed brands such as Zara Man, Inditex, Replay Jeans, and Levi's, the designer possesses a unique blend of design expertise and technical acumen. With a background in German automobile design, there's a keen understanding of the importance of lines and proportions in shoe design, contributing to a distinctive quality in every pair of the HOFF Sneaker collection. Having successfully revitalized the HOFF collection from scratch, this seasoned professional continues to drive its growth and prominence in the competitive sneaker market.
